ðŸ“– Summary: Focalboard is an open-source, self-hosted project management tool offering desktop apps and a server edition. It provides features for defining, organizing, tracking, and managing work, serving as an alternative to platforms like Trello, Notion, and Asana. The API allows for programmatic interaction.
